from datagrok_api import DatagrokClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO

base_url = 'http://host.docker.internal:8888/api'
api = DatagrokClient(@USER_API_KEY, base_url)
# Call query that will return information about customers from France in Northwind database
csv_data = api.call_function('Samples.CustomersInCountry', {'country': 'France'})
# Query returns single result that is CSV string
df = pd.read_csv(StringIO(csv_data))
print(df.head())

# Upoload table
table_id = api.upload_table('—ÅustomersInFrance', df)['ID']

# Create dashboard from the table. You can also provide optional third parameter with the name of layout
dashboard_id = api.create_dashboard('Customers', table_id)['ID']

# Share dashboard with all users
api.share_dashboard(dashboard_id, 'All users')
